text: my name is Melvin Robinson I'm the
landlord of the Ferren sought sell in
greenfield and the last month to see our
mystery gentleman alive
and speak to him he just came in up to
the bar and asked for the directions to
the top of the mountain it's only a
small hill really and most people know
it's either Lydia call it dove stones or
Indians head witches at the top of the
mountain
so we then walk to the front door and I
explained the roots to the top of the
hill and I just said to him that he
won't get there and back up today in
what's left of the daylight and he said
all right thank you ask me their
directions again so I explained to him
again and that says off he went it
wasn't raining but it was cold and dark
it was two o'clock and it goes dark at
four o'clock so there's no way he would
have got to the top and back before a
loss of light it was an old man and they
were dressed in normal Claus a
lightweight rancour slip-on shoes and he
wasn't dressed for walking up the hill
in the weather and that's what that's
why I remembered him really because he
wasn't dressed for the occasion we get
lots of people asking directions up to
the Dawson's reservoir but more someone
were dressed in walking shoes rucksacks
an erection you know but he wasn't
dressing anything like that
